user.title: Select Source Sensor
user.description: Select the energy price sensor to use as the data source. Supported integrations: EPEX Spot, Energi Data Service.

costs.title: Configure Cost Parameters
costs.description: Configure the cost parameters for {source_entity}. These values will be used to calculate consumption and injection prices.

data_description.consumption_multiplier: Multiplier applied to market price for consumption (Ecopower margin)
data_description.injection_multiplier: Multiplier applied to market price for injection
data_description.injection_deduction: Ecopower deduction per kWh for injection
data_description.chp_certificates: Combined heat and power certificates (Warmte-Kracht Koppeling)

error.sensor_not_found: The selected sensor was not found
error.no_attributes: The selected sensor has no attributes
error.cannot_parse: Cannot parse price data from this sensor. Make sure it's from EPEX Spot or Energi Data Service.
error.unknown_error: An unexpected error occurred. Please check the Home Assistant logs for details.

abort.already_configured: This source sensor is already configured
